member.name: T:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm
member.summary: QC Algorithm Base Class - Handle the basic requirement of a trading algorithm, allowing user to focus on event methods.

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.OnTradeBar(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,QuantConnect.Models.TradeBar})
member.summary: DEPRECATED - v1.0 TRADEBAR EVENT HANDLER New data routine: handle new data packets. Algorithm starts here..

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.OnTick(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{QuantConnect.Models.Tick}})
member.summary: DEPRECATED - v1.0 TICK EVENT HANDLER Handle a new incoming Tick Packet:
member.param: Ticks arriving at the same moment come in a list. Because the "tick" data is actually list ordered within a second, you can get lots of ticks at once.

member.summary: Call this at the end of the algorithm running.

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetDateTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: QC.Engine Use Only: Set the current datetime frontier: the most forward looking tick so far. This is used by backend to advance time. Do not modify

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetRunMode(QuantConnect.RunMode)
member.summary: Set the RunMode for the Servers. If you are running an overnight algorithm, you must select series. Automatic will analyse the selected data, and if you selected only minute data we'll select series for you.
member.param: Enum RunMode with options Series, Parallel or Automatic. Automatic scans your requested symbols and resolutions and makes a decision on the fastest analysis

member.summary: Alias of SetCash(decimal)

member.summary: Set a runtime statistic for the algorithm,
member.param: String value of your runtime statistic

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetStartDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Set the start date for the backtest Must be less than end date and within data available

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetEndDate(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Set the end date for a backtest. Must be greater than the start date

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.GetChartUpdates
member.summary: QC.Engine Use Only: Get the chart updates: fetch the recent points added and return for dynamic plotting.
member.returns: List of chart updates since the last request

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.AddSecurity(QuantConnect.SecurityType,System.String,QuantConnect.Resolution,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add specified data to required list. QC will funnel this data to the handle data routine. This is a backwards compatibility wrapper function.
member.param: MarketType Type: Equity, Commodity, Future or FOREX
When no data available on a tradebar, return the last data that was generated

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.AddSecurity(QuantConnect.SecurityType,System.String,QuantConnect.Resolution,System.Boolean,System.Decimal,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add specified data to required list. QC will funnel this data to the handle data routine.
member.param: MarketType Type: Equity, Commodity, Future or FOREX
When no data available on a tradebar, return the last data that was generated

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.Order(System.String,System.Int32,QuantConnect.OrderType,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Submit a new order for quantity of symbol using type order.
member.param: Buy/Sell Limit or Market Order Type.
Send the order asynchrously (false). Otherwise we'll block until it fills
Place a custom order property or tag (e.g. indicator data).

member.summary: Liquidate all holdings. Called at the end of day for tick-strategies.
member.returns: Array of order ids for liquidated symbols

member.summary: Alias for SetHoldings to avoid the M-decimal errors.
member.param: string symbol we wish to hold
liquidate existing holdings if neccessary to hold this stock

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetHoldings(System.String,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Alias for SetHoldings to avoid the M-decimal errors.
member.param: string symbol we wish to hold
bool liquidate existing holdings if neccessary to hold this stock

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetHoldings(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Alias for SetHoldings to avoid the M-decimal errors.

liquidate existing holdings if neccessary to hold this stock

member.name: M:QuantConnect.QCAlgorithm.SetHoldings(System.String,System.Decimal,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Automatically place an order which will set the holdings to between 100% or -100% of *Buying Power*. E.g. SetHoldings("AAPL", 0.1); SetHoldings("IBM", -0.2); -> Sets portfolio as long 10% APPL and short 20% IBM
member.param: decimal fraction of portfolio to set stock
bool flag to clean all existing holdings before setting new faction.
